frontmatter.title: Python Installation and Hello World
frontmatter.description: Python is an interpreted programming language that was released by Guido van Rossum in 1991. Python's syntax and dynamic typing makes it easier to learn than other languages. In this tutorial we will tackle on how to install Python.

frontmatter.title: Switch Statements
frontmatter.description: Switch statements are an alternative to daisy-chaining if-else statements. It takes in a case variable then compares its value to predetermined cases then runs code depending on which cases match.

frontmatter.title: Functions
frontmatter.description: A function is multiple statements or other functions that are grouped into one. When it is called, the statements and other functions inside are ran.

frontmatter.title: Arrays
frontmatter.description: Arrays work similarly to sets in math. It's a collection of elements, but arrays are ordered through an index. The index of an element in an array is just its position from the start starting from index 0.
